metadata.synopsis: The first longrest in Undercity, Orin will abduct one of the players companion. (Lae’zel, Halsin, Gale or Minthara). Based on the players approval rating with them. (Friend, Good Friend and Romance) Highest approval will be the highest priority.She will appear in camp impersonating her abducted victim and toy with the players. Shortly after, she grows tire of the game and reveals herself. And gives her ultimatum - Kill Gortash and retrieve his Netherstone - and bring it to her at her Bhaal Temple. Or the abducted companion dies. She will then teleport away.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Got the any Undercity location with Debugbook 2) -> Go to region 3) -> Act 3 4) -> Undercity 5) -> Bhaal Temple (or any other Undercity location).6) Add the companion to the camp with the Camp Debug Book.7) Go to camp by the Waypoint system, And start longRest by clicking on the bed/campfire.8) OR you can click the LongRest button from outside the camp which will end the day and teleport all to camp.9) This Campfire Moment dialog will trigger once the night starts automatically.

108.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
108.text: You. This way. Quickly. Eyes down.
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: As the party enters camp, they are intercepted by a bloodied and bruised Minthara. She indicates for them to follow her.

49.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
49.text: Good. Nobody saw you arrive - that will be to our advantage.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player follows Minthara to a secluded area.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: You're covered in gore. More so than usual.

107.speaker: Player
107.text: I knew you couldn't wait to get me alone again.

64.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
64.text: Idiot. Think with your brain, not your groin for once.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Are we playing hide and seek?

11.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
11.text: Yes. Menzoberranzan rules. If we're found, we die.

38.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
38.text: My life is in danger. As I knew it would be the moment I joined you.

45.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
45.text: Wyll asked to speak with me alone, and the moment my back was turned, he tried to kill me.

112.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
112.text: Naturally, he didn't stand a chance. I dealt with him.

119.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
119.text: That brute Karlach asked to speak to me alone. Told me I was no better than the devils who once imprisoned her.

95.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
95.text: Jaheira took me to one side - told me the whole party are against me. That she was the only one bold enough to do what needed to be done.

36.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
36.text: That fawning cleric Isobel asked to speak with me alone. Told me her goddess had asked her to extinguish me.

78.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
78.text: And then she tried to kill me.

90.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
90.text: Gale asked to speak with me alone, and the moment my back was turned, he tried to kill me.

51.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
51.text: The vampire asked to speak to me alone. Accused me of being a threat to your wellbeing, if you can believe it.

121.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
121.text: Shadowheart came to me, flashing those puppy-dog eyes. Asked for my counsel, in private.

75.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
75.text: She was confused. Said the gods had a plan for her, and that I was a threat to it.

1.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
1.text: The githyanki asked me to teach her some combat techniques - naturally, I was pleased to be consulted.

35.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
35.text: But the moment we were alone, she spouted some drivel about my integrity and loyalty.

76.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
76.text: And then she tried to kill me.

16.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
16.text: Naturally, she didn't stand a chance. I dealt with her.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: I think Orin is behind this - she may have infiltrated our camp.

25.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
25.text: No. If the blood-witch were here, I'd be able to smell her.

85.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
85.text: This threat has been with us since Moonrise.

28.speaker: Player
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara steps aside. Behind her, we see a heap on the floor, human sized, covered with a dark, bloody cloth. No part of the body is visible, but a pool of blood is just visible beneath it.

13.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
13.text: Of course I did. Anyone who threatens me either kills me, or dies.

118.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
118.text: The others have despised my presence here since I joined you.

23.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
23.text: I have heard them whisper, I have seen the way they look at me. They begin to see you in the same light.

71.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
71.text: Our relationship disturbs them. It is not only me they conspire to assassinate. They will kill us both.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Let's butcher them all - I've been waiting for an excuse.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Do you have any proof of this?

89.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
89.text: My proof lies beneath that blanket.

74.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
74.text: I only kill when it is necessary. This was necessary.

100.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
100.text: Now we are both in danger.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: We need to kill them all.

41.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
41.text: That is the correct course. I was prepared to convince you - I am glad I do not have to.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: We can talk them around. They listen to me.

50.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
50.text: Pathetic. You don't negotiate with people who wish you dead. You kill them.

44.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
44.text: First, we must dispose of the body. What comes next will be... simpler if we don't arouse suspicions.

122.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
122.text: When the body is hidden, we wait until the dead of night, and kill the others as they sleep.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Let's do it while they're awake. It'll be more enjoyable. Please.

101.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
101.text: Tempting tempting tempting. But not yet. Not yet.
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin-as-Minthara smiles at the player, seductivelyNodeContext: Bossy

84.speaker: Player
84.text: You made this mess. You're on your own.

30.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
30.text: Will you watch when the others kill me? Will you hold my head back while they cut my throat? Whisper goodbyes as I gasp and bleed?
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara smiles.NodeContext: with a smile - knows her plan is about to be set in motion

3.speaker: Player
3.text: You're a murderer, Minthara. I can't let you walk away.

116.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
116.text: You could stick me through the heart. Stick her through the heart. Cut us to bits.
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player/party draw their weapon. Minthara smilesNodeContext: with a smile - knows her plan is about to be set in motion

43.speaker: Player
43.text: Why should I trust you on this? You're a murderer!

20.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
20.text: As are you. Consider yourself lucky that I trust you, or you would not be alive to doubt me.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Conspirators? Assassins? Listen to yourself, Minthara.

12.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
12.text: When we met, I was beholden to a cult dedicated to a false god that controlled me through a parasite in my brain.

15.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
15.text: This latest conspiracy is rather ordinary in comparison. As is the solution.

104.speaker: Player
104.text: I'm sorry, Minthara. I thought you would be safe here.

106.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
106.text: You are not to blame. It is easy for one who has lived a coddled life to mistake my caution for paranoia.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: I don't understand. Why would anyone try to kill you now?

97.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
97.text: Opportunism. My guard was down. It was the first time - it will be the last.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: I welcome you into my camp, and this is how you repay me?

48.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
48.text: I will not apologise for defending myself.

62.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
62.text: The aasimar asked for a word in private. I find her sanctimony irritating, but I agreed to speak with her.

54.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
54.text: Minsc asked to speak to me alone - I expected his usual righteous drivel. Annoying, but harmless.

77.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
77.text: But this time was different. He tried to kill me.

26.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
26.text: Ravengard asked to speak with me alone, and the moment my back was turned, he tried to kill me.

113.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
113.text: I caught the girl, Yenna, rifling through my belongings. When I confronted her, she pulled a knife on me.

56.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
56.text: I overpowered her, of course. A thief I can tolerate, but under duress she admitted to being a spy.

5.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
5.text: Someone has betrayed our presence here. A spy.

27.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
27.text: It was the girl, Yenna. I have dealt with the problem.

109.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara steps aside. Behind her, we see a heap on the floor, human sized, covered with a dark, bloody cloth. No part of the body is visible, but a pool of blood is just visible beneath it.

14.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
14.text: Not the first. I killed my sister in her crib to secure my inheritance.

21.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
21.text: Children should not play at such dangerous games, if they fear getting hurt. This one made some dangerous friends.

81.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
81.text: The cult plan to attack our camp. Tonight.

69.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
69.text: We must not rest tonight. We must lie in wait for them.

120.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
120.text: First, we must dispose of their little spy. Burial or dismemberment. Either will suffice.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Grim work. But it has to be done.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: I don't want to be an accessory to child murder.

86.speaker: Player
86.text: Whatever her crimes, I can't abide the murder of a child in our camp.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: Who do you think sent them?

57.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
57.text: They plan to attack our camp. Tonight.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: How do you know they were a spy?

19.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
19.text: The creature confessed, of course. Their childish bravado didn't last long. They told me everything.

98.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
98.text: All I had to do was twist my knife.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Good work. Our camp is in safe hands with you.

60.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_OrinsImpersonation_Minthara
60.text: I may have been too late. She already reported to her superiors.
